title: Rebecca: The Making of a Hollywood Classic
description: The making of the OscarÂ® Award-winning classic Rebecca is detailed in this enlightening and fascinating book which delves into the behind the scenes drama, struggles and passion that went into the filming of this iconic movie. Biographical sketches of key figures such as author Daphne du Maurier and leading actors Joan Fontaine and Laurence Olivier are included, along with photographs and trivia.
author: Jennifer Leigh Wells
